summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 3.02, 3.05, 3.17, 3.22, 16.6, and 17.61 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300) to define "Shopping Arcade," "Shopping Plaza," "Public Display Area" and "Retail Use," and to adding shopping arcade and shopping plaza floor area bonus provisions in the BM and CM zones.
